dict.acceptation: 诗，诗歌；诗意，诗情；作诗；诗歌艺术；

sent.orig: The others are cowboy poetry, slam poetry, rap poetry, and so on.
sent.trans: 其它的是牛仔诗，撞击诗，吟唱诗，等等。

sent.orig: The poetry it made is not the Modern Chinese Poetry, it belongs the Ancient Chinese Poetry.
sent.trans: 诗界革命产生的是古代汉诗范畴中的近代诗歌而不是现代汉诗范畴中的现代诗歌。

sent.orig: Pure Poetry and Poetry Form Theory are significant explorations to the aesthetic independence of literature.
sent.trans: “纯诗”理论和“诗的形式论”是梁宗岱对文学的审美独立性的富有意义的探索。

sent.orig: Painting is silent poetry and poetry is a speaking picture.
sent.trans: 画是无声的诗，诗是有声的画。（诗画）

sent.orig: In the developing history of Chinese classical poetry, Zhou Bangyan is the Ci Poetry world.
sent.trans: 在我国古代词学发展史上，周邦彦可以说是词坛上的一位巨擘。
